description: dashboard display key java-virtual-machine metrics like Memory, CPU, Memory, Threads, Classes, File-Descriptors and Buffers. Each group of metric is shown in individual rows

panels.description: Healthy - Green
panels.title: Instance (count)

panels.description: The maximum heap used memory.
panels.title: % Heap Used (max)

panels.description: Current count of JVM threads.
panels.title: Current Threads(total)

panels.description: The number of objects waiting in the finalizer queue.
panels.title: Objects waiting

panels.description: VM version info
panels.title: JVM version

panels.description: Used bytes of a given JVM memory area
panels.title: Used memory

panels.description:
Total Loaded - The total number of classes that have been loaded since the JVM has started execution.

Currently Loaded - The number of classes that are currently loaded in the JVM.

Total Unloaded - The total number of classes that have been unloaded since the JVM has started execution.
panels.title: Load

panels.description:
Current, Daemon, peak, started thread count of a JVM.
Deadlocked - Cycles of JVM-threads that are in deadlock waiting to acquire object monitors or ownable synchronizers.
panels.title: Threads

panels.description: Current count of threads by state.
panels.title: Threads state

panels.description: Committed (bytes) of a given JVM memory area.
panels.title: Committed memory (bytes)

panels.description: Initial bytes of a given JVM memory area.
panels.title: Initial memory (bytes)

panels.description: Max (bytes) of a given JVM memory area.
panels.title: Max memory (bytes)

panels.description: Used bytes of a given JVM memory area.
panels.title: Used memory (bytes)

panels.description: Total bytes allocated in a given JVM memory pool
panels.title: Allocated (bytes)(rate)

panels.description: Total bytes allocated in a given JVM memory pool. Only updated after GC, not continuously.
panels.title: Created (bytes)(rate)

panels.description: Initial bytes of a given JVM memory pool.

panels.title: Max (bytes)

panels.title: Init (bytes)

panels.description: Committed after last collection bytes of a given JVM memory pool.
panels.title: Committed (bytes)

panels.description: Used bytes after last collection of a given JVM memory pool.
panels.title: Used (bytes)

panels.description: Max bytes after last collection of a given JVM memory pool.
panels.title: Max (bytes)

panels.description:
Total Loaded - The total number of classes that have been loaded since the JVM has started execution.

Total Unloaded - The total number of classes that have been unloaded since the JVM has started execution.

Currently Loaded - The number of classes that are currently loaded in the JVM.
panels.title: Load

panels.description: The number of objects waiting in the finalizer queue.

panels.title: Used bytes

panels.description: Bytes capacity of a given JVM buffer pool.

panels.description: Time spent in a given JVM garbage collector in seconds
